meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed kanamycin to help fight the bacterial infection.
meanings.sent2: She took kanamycin as directed by the pharmacist.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but kanamycin crashed it!
meanings.sent4: Kanamycin acted like a brave soldier, attacking the bacterial army.
meanings.sent5: The kanamycin medicine was like a superhero, saving the day from the evil bacteria.

meanings.definition: A medication that belongs to the aminoglycoside class.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacist explained the benefits of using kanamycin from the aminoglycoside class.
meanings.sent2: Kanamycin is a type of medication that falls under the aminoglycoside class.
meanings.sent3: In the world of medications, kanamycin was the cool kid in the aminoglycoside class.
meanings.sent4: She thought of kanamycin as the star student in the aminoglycoside class.
meanings.sent5: Among the aminoglycoside class, kanamycin stood out like a shining star.

meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits protein synthesis in bacteria.
meanings.sent1: Kanamycin works by stopping the bacteria from making proteins.
meanings.sent2: The mechanism of action of kanamycin involves blocking protein synthesis in bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria tried to dance, but kanamycin made them forget the moves!
meanings.sent4: In the bacterial world, kanamycin was the silent protein synthesis blocker.
meanings.sent5: The kanamycin substance was like a gatekeeper, preventing the bacteria from creating proteins.
